title.rendered: A&A Associate gets featured in THE BUZZZKETEERS for sustainability consulting firm to kickstart plans for a net zero journey.

content.rendered:
A&A Associates has become the first business setup company in Dubai, to associate with a sustainability consulting firm to kickstart plans for a net zero journey.

We feel proud to be featured in the top UAE newspaper THE BUZZZKETEERS.

excerpt.rendered:
Dubai: Over a dozen expat business owners from different walks of life and nationalities got together at a special event on Monday ahead of the International Women’s Day to pay rich tributes to UAE for empowering them.

Learn More
